title: [Bank of Ta'Illistim, Lobby]
description: The glimmer of moonlight that shines through the stained glaesine rosette windows dances across the polished white marble floors.  Several of the city guard patrol the bank's lobby, seemingly at ease, but ever watchful for any sign of impending trouble.
